function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of proximity to green space in residential areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban planning and design risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quality of urban green space","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lower quality green space in poorer risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumption of benefits from proximity to parks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction of public services and
